version_description: Back-end updates

You’ll notice we have updated the app's icon on your home screen.
First steps towards fully encrypting your apps connection to our servers.
We've made it easier to access the menu when there's breaking news and fixed minor playback issues for some users.
We've been working hard to improve the video experience and squashed some bugs in the process.

We’ve heard your feedback! Breaking news alerts will now take you directly to the story.
We have a lot of improvements coming. Stay tuned!

We’ve heard your feedback! Breaking news alerts will now take you directly to the story.
We have a lot of improvements coming. Stay tuned!
This is a big one! We’ve got a new look home screen with more stories and bigger images. Fox News Channel is now just one tap away on iPhone.
This is a big one! We’ve got a new look home screen with more stories and bigger images. Fox News Channel is now just one tap away on iPhone.
We’re now ready for iOS 11.
We're now filling your screen from edge to edge on the iPhone X!
We’ve enhanced the article experience by including tweets and images.
We're now filling your screen from edge to edge on the iPhone X!
We’ve redesigned and rebuilt the app from the ground up to give you a cleaner, easier, and faster Fox News experience on your phone and tablet.
We’ve redesigned and rebuilt the app from the ground up to give you a cleaner, easier, and faster Fox News experience on your phone and tablet.
Continued improvements to our redesigned app that make the experience even cleaner, easier, and faster.

When an editor puts an Instagram in a story, it will now display in the mobile app.

We've also fixed an issue where some users were too frequently prompted to re-enter their TV provider info. If you're still encountering this bug, please reach out
We're making continuous performance, reliability and feature improvements.

The latest version of the Fox News app has more of what you want!

•Save Articles - Now, simply tap “Save” on the bottom bar of any article. You can find all of your saved stories in the “For You” tab.

•Fox News Alert - Never miss breaking ne

We are making it easier for you to watch Fox News Channel whenever you want, wherever you want.  We have just added Apple Single Sign On (SSO) for supported pay TV providers. If your provider does not support Single Sign On, that's OK! You will just need

The latest version of the Fox News app has more of what you want!

Autoplay - We’ve given you the option to disable video autoplay throughout the app.

Spotlight Search - When you use your device’s search functionality, now you will see result
We're making continuous performance, reliability and feature improvements.

Thank you for all of your feedback - we've been listening! A great video experience is important to us here at Fox News and our team has made major updates to the video player.

We're making continuous performance, reliability and feature improvements.

We’ve made updates to address slow loading that some of our users are experiencing on launch.

If you continue to experience this issue, do not hesitate to reach out - we want to help! Connect with us here: http://www.foxnews.com/contactus
We're making continuous performance, reliability and feature improvements.

Thank you for your patience! Our developers have worked tirelessly to address the slow loading issue users are continuing to experience after the latest update.

We've made additional performance, reliability and feature improvements.

Fox News is back on your Today View!

To add the Fox News widget swipe right on your home screen then tap edit.

We're making continuous performance, reliability and feature improvements.
Fixed a minor issue with the Today Widget.

Introducing the "Browse" tab, which gives you faster access to news by topic.

We value your feedback, so if you run into any issues or have suggestions don't hesitate to reach out to us! Connect with us here: http://www.foxnews.com/contactus

- Now you can access your favorite Fox News shows quickly and easily through the "Browse" tab.
- We’ve added background playback so you can use other apps while listening to video.

We’re excited to introduce “Dark Mode”, which changes the theme of the app to darker colors for easier readability and improved battery life.

To enable, go to Settings in the "For You" tab and toggle on "Dark Mode".

We have been busy making updates to the video player and cable provider log-in process to provide you with a great viewing experience when streaming Fox New Channel and Fox Business Network on our apps.
